titleStmt.title: The originall cause of temporall evils. The opinions of the most ancient heathens concerning it, examined by the sacred Scriptures, and referred unto them, as to the sourse and fountaine from whence they sprang. / By Meric Casaubon D.D.
titleStmt.author: Casaubon, Meric, 1599-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. and are to be sold by Richard Minne, at the signe of S. Paul in Little Britain.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of S. Paul in Little Britain.
